details.name: chain_name
details.description: The name of the chain for swapping tokens. Here are the valid chain names: Ethereum, BNB Chain, BNB Chain Testnet, Polygon, Moonbeam Testnet, Cronos, Cronos Testnet, Mumbai Testnet, Avalanche FUJI Testnet, Avalanche, Fantom Testnet, Fantom, AminoX Testnet, Arbitrum Goerli Testnet, Arbitrum One, Optimism: 10, Optimism Goerli, zkSync Era, zkSync Era Goerli, ZKsync Era Sepolia, Polygon zkEVM Testnet, Mantle, Mantle Testnet, Manta Testnet, Manta, Blast Sepolia

details.name: from_token
details.description: The token symbol to swap from. Here is the mapping of token name and token symbol: Wrapped BNB: WBNB, USDT: USDT, BUSD Token: BUSD, USDC: USDC, DAI: DAI, openANX Token: OAX, CAKE: CAKE, BakeryToken: BAKE, Polkadot Token: DOT, Impossible Finance: IF, Coin98: C98, Impossible Decentralized Incubator Access Token: IDIA, OpenSwap: OSWAP, mOpenSwap: mOSWAP, Project: PRO, mProject: mPRO, mIDIA: mIDIA, Testing: TS, tokenT: TT, JetSwap Token: WINGS, dummy BVR: dBVR, PROJECT: PROJECT, dummy Brickken: BKN

details.name: to_token
details.description: The token symbol to swap to. Here is the mapping of token name and token symbol: Wrapped BNB: WBNB, USDT: USDT, BUSD Token: BUSD, USDC: USDC, DAI: DAI, openANX Token: OAX, CAKE: CAKE, BakeryToken: BAKE, Polkadot Token: DOT, Impossible Finance: IF, Coin98: C98, Impossible Decentralized Incubator Access Token: IDIA, OpenSwap: OSWAP, mOpenSwap: mOSWAP, Project: PRO, mProject: mPRO, mIDIA: mIDIA, Testing: TS, tokenT: TT, JetSwap Token: WINGS, dummy BVR: dBVR, PROJECT: PROJECT, dummy Brickken: BKN

details.name: from_amount
details.description: The amount of the token to swap.

intents.name: fetch_file_from_storage
intents.description: Get file from storage. It could be a document, image, video, etc.
